description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.6m in depth, maximum height of 4m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension together with the existing enlargement would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraphs A.1(ja) and (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

If the proposal for the change of use includes building operations such as alterations to elevations and increase in height of the building to facilitate change of use and erection of a side extension, further evidence that these building operations is lawful would be required in any re-submission.
